To watch the first one with no sign up and sheit: 

http://ffilms.org/vhs-2012/

I found both movies quite entertaining. The first one was a little better though.

The first of this series was strange, made no sense whatsoever, and was not very good at all. Number two is not as good as the first, so I wouldn't waste my time. Unless you want to get really baked and watch this for a total mindfuck I wouldn't bother with it. Just mindless gore with a barely functioning story that makes no sense.

While this series reminds me of old 80's horror mags like The Unexpected, in this installment they put in more cheap scares, loads of gore, and less story.
I still really liked two of the stories but really its a watch and toss.
